name: WebcomicsReviewsandInterviews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
WCRI is a webcomic podcast devoted to the creation and business of webcomics. There are how-to shows on how to create, draw, write, and market webcomics, as well as reviews on webcomics. There are also interview shows with creators, businessmen and others involved with webcomics. In short, if you want to create and make money from webcomics, this is where you start.

WCRI Flash Brief is to provide advice for writers in both how to become a better writer as well as how to market yourself more effectively. There are also affirmations in order to deal with the trials and tribulations of being a writer in the first place. So basically, this flash briefing offers both advice and hope for writers.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
